short_description: hidden meadow equestrian center is an equine services company based in glastonbury, connecticut, united states.
long_description: come, enjoy horses with us. located in the center of glastonbury we are a small facility with big aspirations. our main focus is to bring to the public the beauty of horses and nature.
generated_description: hidden meadow equestrian center is a horse riding school located in glastonbury, committed to providing top quality care and training to all the equines at their facility. their main focus is to bring to the public the beauty of horses and nature, and to help others in the surrounding area learn the joys of horses or rekindle their love of them. they offer a 15% discount on riding lessons when purchased online and are dedicated to keeping horses healthy, happy, and sound.
